title: Reign - Weapons Of Mass Destruction (EP)  2015  ak6103
description:
The killer street thrash band known as REIGN was formed in 2013 in Chicago IL. Fusing Death Metal rhythms , progressive song layering, old school thrash riffs, and a punk attitude, REIGN is a sonic force to be reckoned with.
 
Throughout 2013 they built an underground following, gained a reputation for high energy shows and toured the midwest (without any recorded material!).

 In 2014 REIGN released a single, "New World Order"(DEMO) , a music video and a full length EP is to follow. Stay tuned!
